summary: WHILE DRIVING IN THE RAIN, WINDSHIELD WIPERS CAME OFF WINDSHIELD AND WOULD NOT COME BACK ON.  WE UNDERSTAND THAT NEWELL COACH HAS BEEN AWARE OF THIS PROBLEM FOR ABOUT A YEAR AND STATES THEY CANNOT GET THE PARTS TO CORRECT THIS.  THIS KIND OF THING IS REAL SAFETY ISSUE AS THIS IS A MOTORHOME AND WE HAD NO PLACE TO PULL OVER.  IT WAS A FRI NIGHT IN ST LOUIS  AT RUSH HOUR.  *TR
